text: I've always liked this jazzy lounge theme. I thought the Xenoverse games were solid, but it seems like Dragon Ball FighterZ really had mass market appeal. It's not surprising since Arc System Works are behind it and they are masters of the 2D fighting genre. Next time I have an itch to play a fighting game, I will surely go for that one.
author: SupraDarky

text: Good thing, too. DBFZ has  downright incredible character themes. Seriously, they're one of my favourite things about the whole game.
